item.title: 印度准财富基金寻求将资产翻番至 100 亿美元
item.description: 在全球增长最快的主要经济体对城市基础设施需求激增的推动下，印度 49 亿美元的准主权财富基金正努力在未来 30 个月内将其管理资产翻一番，达到 100 亿美元。【原文：India’s $4.9 billion quasi-sovereign wealth fund is seeking to double its assets under management to $10 billion within the next 30 months, fueled by surging demand for urban infrastructure in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 贝森特敦促美国央行降息后黄金上涨
item.description: 在财政部长斯科特-贝森特敦促美国央行降低借贷成本后，市场对美联储降息的押注增加，黄金连续第三天上涨。【原文：Gold rose for a third day as bets on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts increased after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent urged the US central bank to lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 丰业银行裁减美国和亚太地区的投资银行家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）在美国和亚太地区的投资银行部门进行了一系列裁员。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia has carried out a series of layoffs in its US and Asia Pacific investment-banking divisions, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国股市牛气冲天，成交额突破 2 万亿元人民币
item.description: 交易活动的高涨唤起了中国股市的动物精神，交易员们都在为进一步上涨做准备。【原文：Elevated trading activity is rousing animal spirits in China’s stock market, as traders position for further gains.】

item.title: 日本天然气厂大火引发芯片供应链中断担忧
item.description: 日本工业气体制造商关东电气工业株式会社（Kanto Denka Kogyo Co.【原文：A fire at Japanese industrial gas maker Kanto Denka Kogyo Co.’s factory is spurring concerns about possible disruptions to the semiconductor supply chain.】

item.title: 贝森特称日本央行正落后于曲线，预计将加息
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，日本央行在应对通胀方面落后于形势，他罕见地对外国央行的政策决定提出了警告。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Bank of Japan is falling behind the curve in addressing inflation, in a rare comment admonishing policy decisions by a foreign central bank.】

item.title: 波杜尔掠过香港，香港扩大降雨警告范围，降雨量创历史新高
item.description: 热带风暴 "波杜 "经过香港时，香港的中央商务区和外围机场受到狂风和暴雨的袭击，香港再次发出最高降雨量警告。【原文：Hong Kong’s central business district and outer airport were hit by violent gusts and a deluge of heavy rainfall, with the city again issuing its highest rain warning as Tropical Storm Podul passed the region.】

item.title: 白宫解雇波多黎各监督委员会另一名成员
item.description: 白宫解雇了监督波多黎各财政的监察委员会的另一名成员。【原文：The White House has fired another member of the watchdog board that oversees Puerto Rico’s finances.】

item.title: 凭借个人电脑增长和人工智能需求，联想集团利润超出预期
item.description: 联想集团（Lenovo Group Ltd.）公布的利润好于预期，因为公司加快了个人电脑采购，以应对美国可能征收的新关税。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. reported better-than-expected profit after companies accelerated PC purchases to get ahead of potential new US tariffs.】

item.title: 交易员指南：普拉博沃总统的首份印尼预算案
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）将于周五向国会提交 2026 年预算，市场将关注他打算如何在维持财政纪律的同时推进其民粹主义议程。【原文：As Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto presents his 2026 budget to parliament Friday, the market will be watching how he intends to promote his populist agenda while maintaining fiscal discipline.】

item.title: 尽管新加坡债券相对美国债券价格上涨，但仍吸引了大量买家
item.description: 由于投资者在寻求美国资产以外的避险选择，新加坡政府的对冲债券与美国同类债券相比是至少四年来最昂贵的。【原文：Hedged Singapore government bonds are the most expensive versus US peers in at least four years as investors seek safe-haven alternatives to American assets.】

item.title: South32 对非洲铝冶炼厂减值 3.72 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司 South32 Ltd. 将对其在莫桑比克的铝项目计提 3.72 亿美元的减值，该公司称，由于未能获得负担得起的能源供应，该项目可能于明年关闭。【原文：Australian miner South32 Ltd. will take a $372 million impairment on its aluminum project in Mozambique that it said could shut next year, after it failed to secure an affordable energy supply.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所公布与广泛监管调查有关的支出增长情况
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）表示，随着澳大利亚主要交易所运营商受到越来越多的监管审查，今年的成本将有所上升。【原文：ASX Ltd. said its costs will rise this year as mounting regulatory scrutiny weighs on Australia’s main exchange operator.】

item.title: 国际能源署（IEA）警告石油供应将创历史新低，石油价格在两个月低点附近保持稳定
item.description: 在国际能源机构称明年市场供应将达到创纪录的过剩水平后，石油在两个月低点附近企稳。【原文：Oil steadied near a two-month low after the International Energy Agency said the market is on track for record oversupply next year.】

item.title: 泰国德尔塔公司认为人工智能热潮将在未来几年促进销售额增长
item.description: 泰国最有价值的上市公司台达电子（泰国）有限公司（Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl）首席执行官维克多-郑（Victor Cheng）表示，由于对人工智能相关技术的需求不断增长，该公司预计至少在未来几年内销售额将保持 "两位数 "增长。【原文：Delta Electronics (Thailand) Pcl, the country’s most valuable publicly traded company, is predicting “double-digit” sales growth to continue for at least the next couple of years on rising demand for AI-related tech, Chief Executive Officer Victor Cheng said.】

item.title: 企业兴趣扩大，比特币再创新高
item.description: 比特币周三创下历史新高，与美国股市的反弹步调一致，原因是投资者在全球市场上更深地进入了冒险领域。【原文：Bitcoin hit a record high Wednesday, moving in lockstep with a rally in US equities as investors pushed deeper into risk-taking territory across world markets.】

item.title: 交易所运营商迈阿密国际在首次公开募股中筹资 3.45 亿美元
item.description: 迈阿密国际控股公司（Miami International Holdings Inc.【原文：Miami International Holdings Inc. raised $345 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares above a marketed range.】

item.title: 美联储减息势头增强，亚洲股市有望走高：市场综述
item.description: 由于投资者继续加大对美联储下月降息的押注，亚洲股市周四开盘以上涨为主。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a mainly positive open Thursday as investors continued to ramp up bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates next month.】

item.title: 澳洲电信计划额外回购高达 6.54 亿美元的股票
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的电话公司 Telstra Group Ltd. 将在 6 月份完成 7.5 亿澳元回购的基础上，在市场上回购多达 10 亿澳元（6.54 亿美元）的股票，以期向投资者返还更多现金。【原文：Telstra Group Ltd. will repurchase as much as A$1 billion ($654 million) of its stock on market, building on a A$750 million buyback completed in June, as Australia’s biggest phone company looks to return more cash to investors.】

item.title: 派拉蒙将以《壮志凌云 3》为重点促进电影制作
item.description: 派拉蒙 Skydance 公司首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）表示，他计划加强这家上周刚刚获得控制权的媒体公司的电影和电视制作。【原文：David Ellison, chief executive officer of Paramount Skydance Corp., said he plans to boost film and TV production at the media company he acquired control of just last week.】

item.title: 谷歌找到游说规则的变通办法，将大老板们排除在外
item.description: 当时正值 2018 年底，谷歌的领导者们已经厌倦了做第一。【原文：It was the end of 2018, and Google’s leaders were tired of being Number One.】

item.title: 特朗普与英伟达的协议为全球贸易战提供了前进之路
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统提出的从对华芯片销售收入中提成的争议性计划，让美国公司重新考虑与中国的业务计划，为规避多年来的贸易紧张局势提供了一种模式。【原文：President Donald Trump’s controversial plan to take a cut of revenue from chip sales to China has US companies reconsidering their plans for business with the country, offering a model for circumventing years of trade tensions.】

item.title: 即使受到关税冲击，日本上季度仍有可能实现增长
item.description: 据彭博社调查的经济学家称，由于资本支出带动的内需抵消了美国关税的拖累，日本经济在第二季度实现了小幅增长，可能成功避免了陷入衰退。【原文：Japan’s economy likely managed to avoid falling into a recession by posting modest growth in the second quarter, as domestic demand led by capital spending offset the drag from US tariffs, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 高盛为凯悦出售普拉亚度假村提供 14 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团周三为凯悦酒店集团出售从 Playa Hotels & Resorts NV 收购的 15 家一价全包度假村提供了 14 亿美元的杠杆贷款。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. on Wednesday priced a $1.4 billion leveraged loan to support Hyatt Hotels Corp.’s sale of 15 all-inclusive resorts that it had acquired from Playa Hotels & Resorts NV, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 自由港停运缓解铜矿市场紧张局面
item.description: 自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.）在印度尼西亚拥有的一家工厂发生故障后，出人意料地出售了大量铜矿石，为面临历史性供应紧张的冶炼厂带来了短期缓解。【原文：Freeport-McMoRan Inc. is selling unexpectedly large volumes of copper ore following an outage at a plant it owns in Indonesia, bringing short-term relief to smelters who’ve faced a historic squeeze on supply.】

item.title: 思科前景黯淡，投资者渴望人工智能提振
item.description: 思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, gave a lukewarm forecast for the current fiscal year, disappointing investors who hoped for a boost from massive AI data center projects.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 寻求私人信贷为 Olo 收购融资
item.description: 据不愿透露私人信息的知情人士透露，Thoma Bravo 已与私人信贷机构进行了谈判，以筹集 6 亿美元的债务，帮助其为收购酒店软件公司 Olo Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo has held talks with private credit lenders to raise $600 million of debt to help finance its acquisition of hospitality software company Olo Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter, who asked not to be identified discussing private information.】

item.title: 阿根廷通胀在政策失误后温和加速
item.description: 上个月，阿根廷的月度通胀势头有所回升，受管制的物价上涨与比索过剩相撞，引发了阿根廷比索自 2023 年以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Monthly inflation in Argentina picked up some momentum last month as regulated price hikes collided with a peso overhang that sparked the currency’s worst month since 2023.】
